document_data.name: Primordial Ward
document_data.mainbody: '''''Primordial ward''''' was an [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that conferred protection from a variety of elements on its caster.
document_data.Effects: The spell granted the caster magical resistance against [[acid]], cold, [[fire]], lightning, and thunder for up to 1 minute, as long as the caster kept concentrating. Additionally, the spell's energy could be concentrated on a single element, completely blocking any damage of the chosen type for a few seconds, after which the spell ended.
document_data.Components: The spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
